sentences.en: A stammering child can benefit from speech therapy.
sentences.cn: 口吃的孩子可以从言语矫治中获益。

sentences.en: Family therapy showed us how to communicate with each other.
sentences.cn: 家庭疗法指导我们彼此之间的沟通交流。

sentences.en: He is having therapy to conquer his phobia.
sentences.cn: 他在接受治疗以克服自己的恐惧症。

sentences.en: He reacted very badly to the radiation therapy.
sentences.cn: 他接受放射治疗，副作用很大。

sentences.en: Hormone replacement therapy is very important and should be instituted early.
sentences.cn: 激素替代治疗非常重要，应该及早开始。

sentences.en: I underwent aversion therapy for my addiction to smoking.
sentences.cn: 我因为吸烟成瘾接受了厌恶疗法的治疗.

sentences.en: If the cancer returns, radiation therapy is successful in 90 per cent of cases.
sentences.cn: 如果癌症复发，放射性疗法有90%的治愈率。

sentences.en: In therapy, she began to let go of her obsession with Mike.
sentences.cn: 在心理治疗中，她开始逐渐放下对麦克的痴迷。

sentences.en: It is far too early to make sweeping statements about gene therapy.
sentences.cn: 现在对基因疗法下结论还为时过早。

sentences.en: Mention sex therapy and most people will titter in embarrassment.
sentences.cn: 提及性治疗，大多数人会尴尬地偷笑。

sentences.en: She felt better and the psychiatrist took her off drug therapy.
sentences.cn: 她感觉好些了，那位精神科医生让她停止了药物治疗。

sentences.en: The book gives you a flavour of what alternative therapy is about.
sentences.cn: 这本书让你大致了解一下什么是替代疗法。

sentences.en: The hotel's new Spa offers every kind of rejuvenating treatment and therapy.
sentences.cn: 这个酒店新的温泉疗养区提供各种养生护理和诊疗服务。

sentences.en: We are beginning to have some insight into drug therapy.
sentences.cn: 我们开始对药物治疗有了一些深入了解。

sentences.en: We used a combined regimen of injection treatment and radiation therapy.
sentences.cn: 我们采用了针剂注射和放射治疗相结合的方法.
